body_text:
What are the differences between Super Saiyan God and Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan? As stated in the title, what are the differences between the two?
Are they supposed to be entirely different or is simply the next stage of the previous?

Is it possible that Goku is more powerful than Beerus in Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan form? In DBZ: Battle of Gods, Goku became Super Saiyan God and he makes Beerus use upto 70% of his energy. So, is it possible for Goku to defeat Beerus in his Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan form?
